title: Love Will Conquer All
lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh-ooh
Whoa, oh, whoa
Woo, ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh
Whoa, oh, whoa
[Chorus]
Here we are
Out here, me and you
Reaching out to each other
Is all that we can do
Here we stand
Trying not to fall
There's no need to worry
Love will conquer all
[Verse 1]
Do you really want to know
Just how long love will last?
Will all of the bad times pass?
How can we make things right?
Ooh, and why
Why is the world so unkind?
We surely can find peace of mind
If we only see the light

[Bridge]
Can't we see that
[Chorus]
Here we are
Out here, me and you
Reaching out to each other
Is all that we can do
Whoa, here we stand
Trying not to fall
Oh, there's no need to worry
Love will conquer all
[Verse 2]
Can somebody tell me why
Why do our dreams go wrong?
Why can't we all belong?
Ooh, where did we start?
Oh, and tell me when
When will we ever learn?
There's nowhere else we can turn
The truth is in our hearts
[Bridge]
Here we are together
(Ooh, ooh, ooh)
(Whoa, oh, oh) Baby
(Ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh)
(Whoa, oh, oh) Ahh
(Ooh, ooh) Ooh, ooh
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh, ooh) Whoa, whoa
(Whoa, whoa, whoa) Oh

[Pre-Chorus]
Sometimes the road gets hard to travel
Sometimes the pain's too much to bear
Sometimes, when life seems to unravel
That's the time, oh, to say
We're going to make it anyway
Can't you see that?
[Chorus]
Here we are
Out here, me and you
Reaching out to each other
Is all that we can do
Here we stand, trying not to fall
There's no need (There's no need to worry) Whoa
Love will conquer all
[Outro]
(Ooh, ooh, ooh) Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
(Whoa, oh, oh) Give love a chance
(Ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh)
(Whoa, oh, oh) Ahh
(Ooh, ooh, ooh)
(Oh, oh, oh)
